transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello madam?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello. Hello, awaz aa rahi hai sir, hello?
Customer: Madam, mai Google meet me aaya hu.
Executive: Ha sir, aapne abhi join kiya hai.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Aap sir ek baar mujhe apni screen present kariye, ek baar dobara se login kariye.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Screen share karna hai.
Customer: Present.
Customer: Hello, okay, ho gaya?
Executive: Ha sir, visible hai aapki screen mujhe abhi.
Customer: OTP nahi mila madam.
Executive: Nahi aaya?
Customer: OTP nahi mila.
Executive: Okay, sir ye aapke isi number pe na, ye primary wale number pe, ek baar mai aapko na normal ek text message dal rahi hu, aapko receive ho to bataiyega.
Customer: Batao.
Executive: Theek hai? Ha ha, line par hi rahiye mai kar rahi hu.
Customer: Kis number pe bhej rahe, kya bol ke bhej rahe?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ha madam.
Executive: Sir dekhiye maine aapko hi message kiya hai, receive hua aapko?
Customer: Yes yes yes yes, I got a SMS, normal SMS from your mobile, Tania.
Executive: Ha ha, hi message aaya hai aapko.
Customer: Mai bhi mai bhi reply kar raha hu.
Executive: Nahi nahi, aap reply nahi kariye sir, mujhe bas ye check karna tha ki aapko normal message receive ho raha hai ya nahi ho raha hai.
Customer: Ho raha hai madam.
Executive: Ek second, ek second sir line par hi rahiye. Mam.
Executive: Mam, inko na maine normal message kiya.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Sir ek baar usme jaiye. Sir ek baar PNS setting me jaiye.
Customer: Kidhar?
Customer: Kaise jana udhar login hi nahi hua PNS setting me kaise jana wo?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: PNS setting me kaise jana login hi nahi hai na bhai.
Executive: Mam jab login hi nahi hai to PNS setting me kaise jayega. Login karne me to.
Executive: Sir ek second mai apne end se check karke bata rahi hu aapko, ek second sir ek second.
Executive: Mai ek baar apne end se check kar rahi hu ki aapke notifications wagera on hai.
Executive: Sir ye problem kab se aa raha hai?
Customer: Ek mahina ho gaya madam.
Customer: One and half month.
Executive: Mam notifications to on hai.
Executive: Mam?
Customer: Madam.
Customer: Isko OTP nahi ja raha hai.
Customer: Are login nahi kar pa raha hai ye.
Customer: Login nahi kar pa raha.
Customer: Account hi login nahi ho raha hai, OTP nahi ja raha hai primary number pe.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir sir ek baar na ha sir ek baar na incognito mode pe jaiye, waha se ek baar login karne ka try kariye.
Customer: Current chala gaya madam, kya karna?
Executive: Sir incognito mode pe jaiye ek baar.
Customer: Ha?
Executive: Ye sir mai aapko bata rahi hu, ye aapki jo three lines bankar aa rahi hai.
Customer: Madam, power is disconnected in my office now.
Executive: Sir aap video meet pe to hai na, hello?
Customer: Mai kaise dikhega current nahi hai madam, power cut ho gaya, disconnect ho gaya power.
Executive: Sir fir se power wo ho gayi hai.
Customer: Ab aapka ha hello.
Customer: Computer is shut down due to power power problem, current problem, current.
Executive: To sir fir bataiye mai kaise dekhu.
Customer: Sab connect karunga.
Customer: Thodi der se mai call back karta hu, thodi der se mai call back karta hu aadha ghanta.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is unable to log in.

- OTP is not being received.

- Power outage at customer's office.



Resolution:

- Executive sent a test SMS to the customer.

- Executive asked to check PNS settings.

- Executive checked notifications from their end.

- Executive suggested logging in via incognito mode.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back after half an hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- login, otp, pns setting, notifications, power outage
